title: IG & TikTok Social Media VA – Follow, Like & Comment for Niche Brand
job_overview:
Salary: $4.00/hour — $192/month (flat)
Hours: Part-Time – ~12 hrs/week
Type: Long-term – Daily, ongoing
Job Description:
We need a Filipino social media assistant to help us grow our Instagram and TikTok pages by liking, following, and commenting in our niche daily. This is not spam work — you’ll use real voice, emotion, and a content guide.
Your Tasks Will Be:
• Follow 100+ niche accounts per day
• Like and leave 50–100 authentic comments/day
• Log who you followed & results
• Optional: Reply to DMs using simple scripts
Requirements:
• Instagram + TikTok savvy
• Strong English grammar
• Understands “real” human comments, not spam
• Organized and reliable
• No bots or automation tools allowed — all engagement must be 100% manual and human-written
To Apply, Send Us:
1. A sample comment you'd leave on a self-help or mental health post
2. Your time zone and daily availability
3. 1–2 sentences about why you’d love to help grow a coaching movement
Looking for loyal teaUpgrade to see actual infombers ready to grow with a viral brand. You’ll be trained and supported — we just want consistency and energy.
